data.prayer: Father, encourage the 86 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Anegada, British Virgin Islands
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the state of Anegada to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 86 believers in the state of Anegada the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Anegada, British Virgin Islands be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of Anegada. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Anegada, British Virgin Islands. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Anegada words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."
